column1: Uchi////I've been to Uchi twice. The first time was to decide if I wanted to celebrate my 20th birthday there and I had a great experience. Come my birthday we had a reservation for 7 pm and ended up waiting 30 minutes to be seated at a table. They told us the party at the table we had reserved was "finishing dessert"
column2: and ended up breaking the light bulb above the table. The table was then given to a different party that arrived after us. Then while deciding what to order we had a completely random waitress come and take all our menus and move them to the menu holder under the table
column3: even as we told her we were still looking at them. Overall it was just a bad time.
